Migrate Video Artifact Defaults
Update all existing video artifacts to use new default settings

New Video Defaults:

  • Hide Controls: Video controls hidden by default
  • Loop: Videos loop continuously
  • Muted: Videos start muted

Users can still change these settings via right-click context menu

This will update all video artifacts in the database

Safety:

  • This migration is safe to run multiple times
  • Videos already migrated will be skipped
  • Existing metadata is preserved
  • Only adds new default fields
  • No data is deleted
